abstracts.cdata!:
The project development objective of the
            Education for All (EFA) Fast Track Initiative Catalytic Fund
            Grant Project is to support the Government of Lesotho: (i)
            in consolidating the gains obtained in primary education
            enrollment of boys and girls; (ii) in improving quality in
            primary education; and (iii) in expanding pro-poor
            pre-primary education; through improvements in school
            infrastructure, improved distribution of qualified teachers,
            interventions to enhance the quality of teaching, and
            improved access to reception classes. Negative impacts
            include: soil erosion, water resources, air quality, natural
            habitats, and fauna and flora. Mitigation measures include:
            1) construction in dry season; protection of soil surfaces
            during construction; re-vegetation or physical stabilization
            of erodable surfaces; 2) proper disposal of chemicals and
            other hazardous materials; 3) special attention to drainage;
            prevention of erosion; consideration of alternative
            alignments; retention ponds; proper disposal of oil and
            other hazardous materials; 4) slung of latrines at safe
            distances from wells and using closed systems for sewage
            drainage; and 5) restoration of vegetation; cleanup of
            construction sites.
